para.sentence: Let \tau=\ifrac{\omega_{3}}{\omega_{1}} and f_{1}(s,\tau)=\frac{{\cosh^{2}}\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\tau s\right)}{1-2e^{-s}\cosh \left(\tau s\right)+e^{-2s}},f_{2}(s,\tau)=\frac{{\cos^{2}}\left(\tfrac{1}{2}s\right)}{1-2e^{i\tau s}\cos s +e^{2i\tau s}}.

Then \wp\left(z\right)=\frac{1}{z^{2}}+8\int_{0}^{\infty}s\left(e^{-s}{\sinh^{2}} \left(\tfrac{1}{2}zs\right)f_{1}(s,\tau)+e^{i\tau s}{\sin^{2}}\left(\tfrac{1}{ 2}zs\right)f_{2}(s,\tau)\right)\mathrm{d}s, and \zeta\left(z\right)=\frac{1}{z}+\int_{0}^{\infty}\left(e^{-s}\left(zs-\sinh \left(zs\right)\right)f_{1}(s,\tau)-e^{i\tau s}\left(zs-\sin\left(zs\right) \right)f_{2}(s,\tau)\right)\mathrm{d}s, provided that -1<\Re(z+\tau)<1 and \left|\Im z\right|<\Im\tau.
